name: GitHub Milestones ICS Feed
description: A Heroku app to get an iCalendar feed of your GitHub Milestones.

AUTH_USERNAME.description: The username to authenticate the ICS feed.

AUTH_PASSWORD.description: The username to authenticate the ICS feed.

GITHUB_USERNAME.description: The GitHub user you want to get the milestone data from.

GITHUB_ORGS.description: The GitHub orgs you want to get the milestone data from (multiple orgs sperated by a comma).
